column4: ------  Feb. 13 (Xinhua) – A Malaysian national died of a heart attack at his home in Sen Sok.------Police identified the victim as FRANCIS ANTHONY
column5: a 74-year-old Malaysian male.------Kok Speu provincial police received information that at the scene
column6: a Malaysian woman who lived at the same house. Police
column7: in collaboration with the Forensic Bureau of Phnom Penh Police Commission visited the scene.------In conclusion
column9: a Phnom Penh Municipal Court official
column10: confirmed that the man had died of a heart attack.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/289939
